title: Personal Website
description: A personal website that serves as an online resume and as a showcase of my web development abilities. The website is built using React for the back end, and Bootstrap for the front end.

title: Minecraft Mod
description: Thesis writing for a Bachelor's Final Year Project. Designing, developing, and testing new content added using the Forge API in Java, including new Entities' AI, procedural world generation, and terrain-modifying mechanics.

title: Unreal Engine Game Prototype
description: Videogame prototype designed and developed using Unreal Engine 5 for a Game Development class group project. My main focus was level design and main character scripting.

title: Android App
description: Prototype Android app to serve as a companion to the videogame Monster Hunter World to help plan and create character builds for the game.
